casebody.data:
In re David BRILL, Bankrupt. No. 439. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. July 17, 1931.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

Joseph H. Frier and Goldman & Frier, all of New York City, for appellant. Blau, Perlman & Polakoff, of New York City (William Blau and Samuel Mezansky, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee. PER CURIAM.

Order [52 F.(2d) 636] affirmed.
